column3: robert bob l. robert ""bob"" l. collins
column5: longtime resident of albuquerque passed away on june 18
column6: 2015. he is survived by his sister
column8: dennis collins and his wife cheryl; niece
column11: amanda ecker. bob was preceded in death by his loving wife
column12: elizabeth in 2008. bob proudly served his country while serving with the united states marine corps. he will be laid to rest alongside his wife at sunset memorial park. a graveside service will be held friday
